data.title: Product Support - Toad for SQL Server Subscription
data.meta_description: Support information to install, trouble shoot and maintain your Quest product
data.text:
Our technical support staff has identified the following critical information to get you started. To get the best results make sure you read through all material prior to using your Quest Product.

How to disable or enable subscription auto renewal setting?

User has been evaluating Toad and now has purchased, however, Toad is still using the trial license and displays the trial expiration term date on top banner of the application. How does one remove a trial license from Toad for Oracle Subscription?

How to revoke/remove license seats from users?

How to assign someone the Admin or Owner role for a License in the Database Tools License Portal ?

Database Tools License Portal - Overview Video

How to add licenses and register the license to my product?

The ownership (roles) of a license can be transferred via the Database Tools License Portal between: An organization account e.g Acme Corp.An individual Quest account e.g jane@mail.com.

My Automation script does not run when scheduledHow can one troubleshoot, identify and localize to and correct any problems?In addition, how can one learn how to troubleshoot script scheduling and execution issues?• How can one use the Job Manager to troubleshoot issues with scheduled Automation scripts?• How can one use the Windows Task Scheduler to troubleshoot scheduled Automation script issues...

Below is a list of the recommended software along with any documentation that will help with the install process to bring your product to the version referenced.

With Toad, developers and database administrators can use a familiar, proven tool to manage databases. Toad empowers developers and administrators, of varying skill levels, to rapidly create and execute queries, automate database object management, and develop SQL more efficiently. Toad also provides utilities to compare, extract and search for objects, manage projects, import/export data and adm...

When installing Toad for SQL Server 8.0.0.65, there is a message saying that "Visual C++ 2019 Redistributable package" must be installed. The installation of the package fails because according to the installation log, a newer version is already installed. The following error shows: 'Error 0x80070666: Cannot install a product when a newer version is installed.'

The information below represents the most common issues customers are encountering or recent resolutions to help you trouble shoot your Quest Product.

How to disable or enable subscription auto renewal setting?

When I go to Help, Upgrade to get the latest version of Toad I am brought to a web page for a free trial of Toad. I want to go to the page with the latest version available for updating Toad. How do I fix this?

User has been evaluating Toad and now has purchased, however, Toad is still using the trial license and displays the trial expiration term date on top banner of the application. How does one remove a trial license from Toad for Oracle Subscription?

How to revoke/remove license seats from users?

How to transfer and assign subscription licenses from one user account to another? The account (seat) of a license can be transferred via the Database Tools License Portal from one account to another.

How to assign someone the Admin or Owner role for a License in the Database Tools License Portal ?

Rearranging connections in Connection Manager doesn’t work. When you drag a connection record and try to move it to a connection group, a blue arrow appears, but the record doesn’t move there when the mouse is released.

Error in License Portal: "License exists and you have no access." received when adding a license

Error in License Portal: "License type is not supported for the product." received when adding a license

Error when connecting to Azure with Single Tenant Error: Is not configured as a multi-tenant application. Usage of the /common endpoint is not supported for such applications created after '10/15/2018'. Use a tenant-specific endpoint or configure the application to be multi-tenant.
